title: Mission Control Dashboard
description: One hub to oversee your CRM, analytics, and AI workflows all in a sleek control center.

title: AI Content Generator
description: Create blogs, ads, social posts, and emails in seconds. Always on-brand, SEO-friendly, and plagiarism-free.

title: Smart Communication Hub
description: Automate outreach with AI-driven email, and call campaigns.

title: Compliance Guardian
description: Scan messages and content for ADA, TCPA, and FTC compliance. Get instant green-light/red-light approval.

title: AI-Powered Analytics
description: Uncover trends, bottlenecks, and opportunities with AI insights that go beyond traditional dashboards.

title: Branding Copilot
description: Keep your brand consistent with AI-assisted messaging, logos, palettes, and style guide exports.

title: AI Video & Avatar Studio
description: Turn photos into talking avatars, auto-generate videos with captions and music, or launch AI podcasts.

title: Review & Reputation Genie
description: Automate review requests, monitor feedback, and build your online reputation.

title: Local Lead Radar
description: Discover new leads from public records and local events, feeding them directly into your CRM.
